title: 07/09/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 07/09/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Doug Gottlieb filling in for Colin explains how Chris Paul is the best NBA version of Tom Brady. Steph Curry lets it be known that the Warriors Championship window is still wide open! Plus, former Vice President of Basketball Operations for the Memphis Grizzlies John Hollinger joins Doug for all the insight around the league!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
